page.title: 13Shopping Centre,Paddock Wood
page.content: The shopping centre in Paddock Wood is situated along Commercial Road which leads to the railway station.It has a wide variety of shops and serves the local community well.It also caters for the people in outlying villages. There are two main car parks and a station car park for shoppers to use,but Commercial Road can be very busy and congested at certain times of the day. Most elderly people of Paddock Wood are very pleased with the shopping centre as they are able to buy most of the things they require. The shops are within walking distance ofn Macdonald Court and Dowding House,then two main homes for the elderly.However most Saturday shopping is done in Maidstone, Tonbridge or Tunbridge Wells.
